About.title: Hey!, nice to meet you, I am a Full-stack and DevOps developer who hopes to help you with your next challenge. Feel free to reach out to me via GitHub or LinkedIn.
About.about1: Over the past several years, I've gained hands-on experience both as a freelance developer and as an employee, delivering end-to-end solutions across a wide range of clients, teams, and industries. These roles have sharpened my ability to adapt quickly, communicate effectively, and build scalable, production-ready applications.
About.about2: On the frontend, I specialize in React, Next.js, and Remix.run, often working with Vite and TailwindCSS to deliver fast, responsive interfaces. I frequently use Redux for state management and Jest for testing. I've also used platforms like WordPress and Zoho Sites to build landing pages or AI-driven experiences.
About.about3: On the backend, I've developed APIs using TypeScript with Express.js and NestJS (with or without Prisma), Python with FastAPI, Django, and Flask, PHP (native), and C# with ASP.NET. I'm confident working with SQL and NoSQL databases, including MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, MongoDB, and Firebase.
About.about4: As part of my DevOps skill set, I've deployed and managed applications across major cloud platforms such as AWS (Lightsail, S3 Bucket, RDS, Route 53), Azure, and Google Cloud Platform. I regularly use Docker for containerization, GitHub Actions for CI/CD workflows, and platforms like Vercel, Render, Fly.io, Supabase, and AppWrite for hosting. I also integrate third-party tools including Resend, EmailJS, Make, Zapier, and the Zoho suite (Deluge, CRM, Creator, Flow).
About.prebutton: But don't take my word for it...
